717582f-a.text:
Broadway, south from and including West 56th Street. The Broadway Tabernacle shown on the left, is at the N.E. corner of West 56th Street, with a clearance (56th to 55th) just south. Across the clearance, and at the S.E. corner of 55th Street, is the Hotel Woodward, a 12-story structure. Silhouetted on the skyline, is the Empire State Building.
August 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

717583f-a.text:
West 56th Street,east side of Broadway,looking south and showing the Broadway Methodist Episcopal Tabernacle.
May 21st,1939
P.L.Sperr,

717581f-a.text: Recieved from Cross E Broun Lo., Harch 1933
